name: Graceland
description:
A textual game with illustrations created for the Scream City jam of April 2019.
As the optional theme was a city, we picked Chicago and played with the idea of the
liminal space and the interaction between past and present of the city.

Navigate your way through the space in between and try to get home,
preferably sane. And pay attention to the occasional empty line.

Eyewitness accounts of the great Chicago fire can be found in this website.

Our lovely art was created by luckynothin.
